info.description: This API provides access to data from the Pangkalan Data Pendidikan Tinggi (PDDikti), the Indonesian Higher Education Database. It allows users to search for and retrieve detailed information about universities, study programs, lecturers, and students.
info.author: ridwaanhall

support.documentation: Complete API documentation with examples and usage guidelines
support.status_monitoring: Real-time service status and performance monitoring
support.traffic_management: Automatic load balancing for optimal performance
